text: COVID ARDS (CARDS) Time-related disease spectrum with two primary phenotypes: Type L Type H Early in presentation » Evolves later Low elastance (normal + High elastance (low compliance) compliance) due to oedema Low V/Q - loss of HPV but low » High shunt due to perfusion of PAP > oedematous units Low lung weight (minor - 5 + High lung weight (again, groundglass opacities on CT) i & oedema) Low lung recruitability + High lung recruitability (like (because lungs are mostly conventional ARDS with well-aerated) — collapsed dependent units)
